messages.message:
Hi all, I'm having trouble with triggering re-extraction after changing the class label in human review. Seeing an "Access Denied" error which seems to happen when `run_binary_async` is called in `/change-classification-label`.

I looked into it, it's happening in the `can_execute_via_api` method in `FlowPerms`.  It's being called in this set of lines:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-handler/src/py/instabase/flow_handler/flow_handler.py#L296-L308
It seems that the changes made in https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72881/files broke an existing flow cc @Xindi Xu

I'm not super familiar with how the existing code was supposed to work, can you take a look?

I think this PR should fix it. I'll test it out after it deploys.
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73364
Sweet okay I'll pull and try again!
Is this going to be backported to uat?
My fix is deployed to aihub sandbox. I tested and I think it's working now. Could you double-check? Thank you!
